title: Border Corners
description: Specifies the corners for the border.

top.title: Top Corner of the border
top.description: Specifies the top corner for the border.

presence.title: Top Corner Presence
presence.description: Specifies the presence attribute for the top corner.

stroke.title: Top Corner Stroke
stroke.description: Specifies the stroke attribute for the top corner.

thickness.title: Top Corner Thickness
thickness.description: Specifies the thickness attribute for the top corner.

radius.title: Top Corner Radius
radius.description: Specifies the radius attribute for the top corner.

inverted.title: Top Corner Inverted
inverted.description: Specifies the inverted attribute for the top corner.

join.title: Top Corner Join
join.description: Specifies the join attribute for the top corner.
